name: La Aroma del Caribe - Immensa
additionalNotes: Originally created for the European market, La Aroma del Caribe now has limited distribution in the U.S. as well. La Aroma del Caribe is handmade in Pepin Garcia's Nicaraguan factory exclusively from Nicaraguan tobaccos cultivated from first generation Cuban seeds. Blessed with a potent, and very Cuban, spicy earthiness, these cigars also boast supporting notes of nuts, cinnamon and leather. A solid medium to full-bodied smoke, Pepin Garcia has outdone himself in constructing these beauties.Â
